name: AppServer 2
status_description: App server is up and running
common_configuration_settings:
NODE_EXPORTER_HTPASSWD_PATH: /edx/app/nginx/nginx.htpasswd
NODE_EXPORTER_NGINX_CONFIG_PATH: /edx/app/nginx/sites-available/node-exporter
NODE_EXPORTER_PASSWORD: null
NODE_EXPORTER_USE_SSL: false
consul_encrypt: 
consul_servers: []
consul_service_config:
  service:
  - enable_tag_override: true
    id: edxapp-pr12338sandbo-appserver-2
    name: edxapp-1
    port: 80
    tags:
    - edxapp
filebeat_ca_cert_url: www.opencraft.com
filebeat_common_prospector_fields: 
filebeat_logstash_hosts: []
filebeat_prospectors:
- fields:
    host: pr12338.sandbox.example.com
    type: edxapp
  paths:
  - /edx/var/log/*/edx.log
  - /edx/var/log/nginx/*.log
- fields:
    host: pr12338.sandbox.example.com
    level: error
    type: edxapp
  multiline:
    match: after
    negate: true
    pattern: ^Traceback
  paths:
  - /edx/var/log/*/edx.log
configuration_settings:
COMMON_HOSTNAME: edxapp-pr12338sandbo-appserver-2
COMMON_SECURITY_UPDATES: true
COMMON_USER_INFO:
- {github: true, name: open-craft, type: admin}
COMMON_VHOST_ROLE_NAME: openstack
EDXAPP_BUGS_EMAIL: contact@example.com
EDXAPP_BULK_EMAIL_DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL: contact@example.com
EDXAPP_CMS_BASE: studio.pr12338.sandbox.example.com
EDXAPP_CMS_NGINX_PORT: 80
EDXAPP_CMS_SITE_NAME: studio.pr12338.sandbox.example.com
EDXAPP_CONTACT_EMAIL: contact@example.com
EDXAPP_DEFAULT_FEEDBACK_EMAIL: contact@example.com
EDXAPP_DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL: contact@example.com
EDXAPP_FEATURES: {ALLOW_ALL_ADVANCED_COMPONENTS: true, AUTH_USE_OPENID: false, ENABLE_DISCUSSION_SERVICE: true,
  ENABLE_DJANGO_ADMIN_SITE: true, ENABLE_INSTRUCTOR_ANALYTICS: true, ENABLE_INSTRUCTOR_EMAIL: true,
  ENABLE_PEARSON_HACK_TEST: false, PREVIEW_LMS_BASE: pr12338.sandbox.example.com,
  REQUIRE_COURSE_EMAIL_AUTH: false, SUBDOMAIN_BRANDING: false, SUBDOMAIN_COURSE_LISTINGS: false,
  USE_MICROSITES: false}
EDXAPP_FEEDBACK_SUBMISSION_EMAIL: contact@example.com
EDXAPP_LMS_BASE: pr12338.sandbox.example.com
EDXAPP_LMS_NGINX_PORT: 80
EDXAPP_LMS_PREVIEW_NGINX_PORT: 80
EDXAPP_LMS_SITE_NAME: pr12338.sandbox.example.com
EDXAPP_PLATFORM_NAME: 'PR#12338: WIP Sandbox for DnDv2 (pomegranited) - open-craft/jill/sandbox-dndv2
  (073e9c5)'
EDXAPP_PREVIEW_LMS_BASE: pr12338.sandbox.example.com
EDXAPP_SERVER_EMAIL: contact@example.com
EDXAPP_SETTINGS: openstack
EDXAPP_SITE_NAME: pr12338.sandbox.example.com
EDXAPP_TECH_SUPPORT_EMAIL: contact@example.com
EDXAPP_TIME_ZONE: UTC
FORUM_RACK_ENV: production
FORUM_SINATRA_ENV: production
SECURITY_UNATTENDED_UPGRADES: true
SECURITY_UPDATE_ALL_PACKAGES: false
SECURITY_UPGRADE_ON_ANSIBLE: true
XQUEUE_SETTINGS: openstack_settings
certs_version: opencraft-release/ginkgo.1
configuration_version: git-branch-name
edx_ansible_source_repo: https://github.com/open-craft/configuration.git
edx_platform_repo: https://github.com/open-craft/edx-platform.git
edx_platform_version: f3b33ef14f7b771a93f4f7d54c396c97dd0daa88
edxapp_worker_default_stopwaitsecs: 1200
forum_version: master
notifier_version: master
xqueue_version: opencraft-release/ginkgo.1
